doc:
Franklin Pangborn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franklin_Pangborn 0 Franklin Pangborn (January 23, 1889 – July 20, 1958) was an American comedic character actor. Pangborn was famous for small but memorable roles with a comic flair. He appeared in many Preston Sturges movies as well as the W. C. Fields films International House, The Bank Dick, and Never Give a Sucker an Even Break. For his contributions to motion pictures, Pangborn received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame at 1500 Vine Street on February 8, 1960.Pangborn was born in Newark, New Jersey. Franklin_Pangborn ( January_23_,_1889 – July_20_,_1958 ) was an_American_comedic_character_actor . Pangborn was famous for small_but_memorable_roles with a_comic_flair . He appeared in many_Preston_Sturges_movies as_well_as the_W._C._Fields_films_International_House , The_Bank_Dick , and Never Give a_Sucker an_Even Break . For his_contributions to motion_pictures , Pangborn received a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame at 1500_Vine_Street on February_8_,_1960 . Pangborn was_born in Newark , New_Jersey .
